name: Babel (patrickbard, giupetry)
description:
For some reason this web version is taking so long to load and the unity loader doesn't look like it's loading (but it is). Please, don't give up on our gave because of that.

This is a simple arcade game set in a chaotic Babel Tower, because there are many people speaking many different languages, you are the only one who speak all of them. 


Get near to an NPC character to talk and score some points, they may want to talk more later. Explore as much floors as you can to get extra points, you can go back to previously entered floors. If the situation is so chaotic that you can't manage to talk with enough people, you might lose the game.

Some of the artwork made by us, some used with appropriate license.

The lovely song used as the game theme is "The Long Way Home" composed by John Gardiner-Garden and performed by Earthly Delights. Courtesy by John Gardiner-Garden himself.

Enjoy our game and send us feedback.

Sincerely, Patrick and Giuliano.
